results.overview: The true story of how a marine seal named Andre befriended a little girl and her family, circa 1962.
results.title: Andre

results.overview: The true story of the British explorer Robert Falcon Scott and his ill-fated expedition to try to be the first man to discover the South Pole - only to find that the murderously cold weather and a rival team of Norwegian explorers conspire against him
results.title: Scott of the Antarctic

results.overview: A woman makes a powerful connection with a surprising stranger on her 30th birthday.
results.title: A Family Affair

results.original_title: Primo tango a Roma... storia d'amore e d'alchimia
results.overview: A man and his assistant invent a powerful aphrodisiac they don't hesitate testing out on the beautiful female populace of their village.
results.title: First Tango in Rome: Romance and Alchemy

results.original_title: Durch die Wälder durch die Auen
results.title: Through the Forests and Through the Trees

results.overview: At Bertrand Morane's burial there are many of the women that the 40-year-old engineer loved. In flashback Bertrand's life and love affairs are told by himself while writing an autobiographical novel.
results.title: The Man Who Loved Women

results.overview: A romantic comedy of a young man and woman that is told in the background of hotel 'Emross'. It has stories of people who met each other at Hotel Emross during the New Year holidays. Each one has his own memory to relate and create relationships or just going nostalgic.
results.title: A Year-End Medley

results.overview: Documentary about the life of Giovanni "Gianni" Agnelli, an influential Italian industrialist and principal shareholder of Fiat.
results.title: Agnelli

results.overview: The documentary portrays a behind-the-scenes look at the poor state of Argentina's civil aviation, and puts the blame on the Argentine Air Force. The Air Force has been in control of air traffic operations since the military takeover of General Juan Carlos Onganía in 1966. The producer/director, Enrique Piñeyro, claims Argentina and Nigeria are the only countries whose air force controls and regulates the airline industry.  The film is heavily based on the Austral Líneas Aéreas Flight 2553 plane crash. Enrique Piñeyro takes his camera, secretly, into the control tower of the Ministro Pistarini International Airport also-known-as Ezeiza, the international airport at Buenos Aires.
results.title: Air Force, Incorporated

results.overview: Anna is stuck: she’s approaching 30 and has just moved back to her rural home-town, and into a shed in her mother’s backyard. She spends her time working a menial job at a local boating center and hides in the depths of her imagination, making movies with her thumbs. Irritated by her childish behavior, Anna's mother insists that she move out of her shed and on with her life. When a troubled young boy starts hanging around, the two form an unlikely bond. Through their strange yet mutually beneficial friendship, Anna slowly begins to confront her perpetual state of arrested development.
results.title: Adult Life Skills

results.original_title: Henry VIII and His Six Wives
results.overview: Adapted from the BBC2 serial The Six Wives of Henry VIII. 1547, King Henry VIII's life has taken a turn for the worse and he is forced to look back over his life and the many loves which had brought him his three children, only one of which was the desired male heir to secure the Tudor dynasty.
results.title: Henry VIII and His Six Wives

results.original_title: The Legend of Jack and Diane
results.overview: Jack and Diane are forced to leave Indiana after discovering secrets about the death of Diane's mother. When their worst fears are confirmed by the chief of police, Jack and Diane create a "Hit List" and exact revenge on everyone involved.
results.title: The Legend of Jack and Diane

results.overview: A movie crew invades a small town whose residents are all too ready to give up their values for showbiz glitz.
results.title: State and Main

results.overview: At the end of the Great War, Arsène Lupin resumed his adventurous life. Theft of three paintings committed by an adversary leads him to the treasure of the Golden Fleece.
results.title: Signed, Arsène Lupin

results.overview: When Gino meets racing driver Bénédicte, it's love at first sight. But Gino has a secret. The kind of secret that can endanger their lives.
results.title: Racer and the Jailbird

results.overview: The puppy love of two teenagers is set against a backdrop of adults struggling with their own lives. As a couple in love, they don't care about anything but themselves and seem totally unaware about everything that surrounds them.
results.title: A Swedish Love Story

results.overview: While on vacation in Rome, married American Mary Forbes becomes entangled in an affair with an Italian man, Giovanni Doria. As she prepares to leave Italy, Giovanni confesses his love for her; he doesn't want her to go. Together they wander the railroad station where Mary is to take the train to Paris, then ultimately reunite with her husband and daughter in Philadelphia. Will she throw away her old life for this passionate new romance?
results.title: Indiscretion of an American Wife

results.original_title: Gernstls Reisen - Auf der Suche nach Irgendwas
results.title: Gernstls Reisen - Auf der Suche nach Irgendwas

results.overview: When a solar storm wipes out the air traffic control system, Air Force One and a passenger jet liner are locked on a collision course in the skies above the midwest.
results.title: Air Collision

results.overview: Patrick Tse is the thief of thieves whose family is long retired from the robin hood lifestyle for 10 years. Recent robberies have occured who use the families calling card and the police forcefully want this mystery solved. They suspect smeone from there past but feel this cant not be him, then who is it?
results.title: Winner Takes All
